# Changelog

All notable changes to this Odoo module will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

## [17.0.1.2.0] - 2025-12-28

### Added

- Update DILVE module. Update views and add new fields: weight, length, width, height, page_count, collections, total_copies.
- New wizard for managing negative ddaa_orders.

## [17.0.1.1.0] - 2025-09-06

The last undocumented release. We will document the following versions.
